original_title: Brains of Britain (or How Quizzing Became Cool)
overview: We all love a good quiz. So here's a question - when did ordinary contestants turn into the pro-quizzers of today? Giving the answers are Victoria Coren Mitchell, Judith Keppel, Chris Tarrant, Mark Labbett, Nicholas Parsons and many more. Narrated by Ben Miller.
title: Brains of Britain (or How Quizzing Became Cool)
